movies.title: VeggieTales: Esther, the Girl Who Became Queen
movies.plot: Esther has been chosen by the king to be queen, but she's about to find out that being queen is going to take more courage than she ever imagined! Esther... The Girl Who Became Queen teaches kids that "you never need to be afraid to do what's right!"
movies.simplePlot: A VeggieTales of Queen Esther and her struggle to save her people from being sent to the Island of Perpetual Tickling (IPT) by her husband the king.

biography.bio: Jessica Kaplan is a producer and actress, known for VeggieTales: Esther, the Girl Who Became Queen (2000), Ben and Burman (2011) and Golden Afternoons (2009).
biography.name: Jessica Kaplan

biography.bio: Pamela Thomas is an actress, known for VeggieTales: Esther, the Girl Who Became Queen (2000), VeggieTales: Lyle, the Kindly Viking (2001) and 3-2-1 Penguins! Trouble on Planet Wait-Your-Turn (2000).
biography.name: Pamela Thomas

biography.bio: Phil Vischer was born on June 16, 1966 in Muscatine, Iowa, USA. He is an actor, known for Jonah: A VeggieTales Movie (2002), VeggieTales: Where's God When I'm S-Scared? (1993) and The Pirates Who Don't Do Anything: A VeggieTales Movie (2008). He is married to Lisa Vischer. They have three children.
biography.name: Phil Vischer

biography.bio: Mike Nawrocki was born on July 8, 1966 in Dayton, Ohio, USA. He is an actor, known for Jonah: A VeggieTales Movie (2002), VeggieTales: The Ultimate Silly Song Countdown (2001) and The Pirates Who Don't Do Anything: A VeggieTales Movie (2008). He is married to Lisa Nawrocki. They have two children.
biography.name: Mike Nawrocki

biography.bio: Kristi V.K. Bramlett is an actress, known for VeggieTales: Esther, the Girl Who Became Queen (2000) and Brothers Three: An American Gothic (2007).
biography.name: Kristi V.K. Bramlett

biography.bio: Char Jackson is an actress, known for VeggieTales: Esther, the Girl Who Became Queen (2000), VeggieTales: Lord of the Beans (2005) and A Snoodles Tale (2004).
biography.name: Char Jackson

biography.bio: Eric Metaxas is a writer and actor, known for Irreplaceable (2014), Rabbit Ears: Peachboy (1993) and Rabbit Ears: The Fool and the Flying Ship (1991).
biography.name: Eric Metaxas
